app_review_response.body:
[RESPOND TO REVIEWS WITHIN 24 HOURS]

[POSITIVE REVIEWS (4-5 stars)]
"Thanks so much [name]! We built CourtLab to solve exactly this — proven data instead of guesswork. Love hearing that it's working for you and your players.

Would love more feedback. Feel free to email us: [courtlab@email].

Keep pushing!"

[NEGATIVE REVIEWS (1-3 stars)]
"Thanks for the feedback, [name]. We take this seriously.

Can you tell us more about [specific issue]? Reach out directly: [email] so we can fix it.

We're committed to making this better."

[FEATURE REQUEST REVIEWS]
"Great idea! We actually have [related feature] in the pipeline. But I want to understand your use case better.

DM us or email: [email]. Let's chat."

[GENERAL RULES]
- Respond within 24 hours
- Address specific feedback (show you read it)
- Offer to help directly (email or DM)
- Be genuine, not corporate-speak
- Use their name if they provided it

personalization_rules.always_research_first: Never send generic outreach. Research 2-3 specific details about the person/club.
personalization_rules.specific_fit_reason: Include 1-2 specific reasons why CourtLab fits THEM, not a generic pitch.
personalization_rules.pain_point_matching: Match outreach angle to their demonstrated pain point or interest.
personalization_rules.tone_matching: If they're formal (corporate), be formal. If they're casual (social media), be casual.
personalization_rules.value_first: Always provide value or genuine help BEFORE asking for anything.
personalization_rules.no_pressure: Position as 'thought you might dig this' not 'you need this'.
personalization_rules.clear_cta: One clear call-to-action per message (demo, free trial, quick call, etc.)

follow_up_strategy.no_response_day_7: Light follow-up: 'Just checking if you got my previous message'
follow_up_strategy.no_response_day_14: Final follow-up: 'One more time — think this might fit your needs. Open to feedback.'
follow_up_strategy.response_received: Move to kanban 'Replied' column, schedule next action (demo, call, trial)
follow_up_strategy.show_interest: Qualify next step (free trial? 15-min demo? Affiliate interest?)

email.body_format: 3-4 paragraphs max, short sentences, clear CTA

twitter_dm.follow_account_first: Yes, like their recent posts before DM
twitter_dm.tools: Twitter web interface (manual copy/paste from template)
twitter_dm.timing: M-F business hours, avoid early morning

instagram_dm.visual_engagement: Like 2-3 of their recent posts first
instagram_dm.timing: Evening hours (6-9 PM local time to recipient)

reddit_comment.disclosure: Mention you're from CourtLab if relevant
reddit_comment.upvote_first: Upvote the post/helpful comments to show engagement
reddit_comment.timing: During active discussion hours (comments on hot posts)

app_store_review.follow_up: If they respond, move to DM or email for deeper conversation
